products.title: Malta Mid Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta mid grey is a stylish choice. A beautiful mid grey shade, making it perfect with lots of colour palettes within the home. This fabric is beautiful within the living room or bedroom, especially when paired with their blackout lining. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Faux Suede Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede charcoal roman blind in a lovely grey colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-rom0004 fabric colour: charcoal material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Faux Suede Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Simple yet stylish the cream faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the traditional & contemporary interiors. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which complement various styles of home decoration. Its a perfect solution to creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The faux suede is soft to the touch, and is incredibly pleasing to the eye. All their blinds are made to measure right here in their west yorkshire factory.

products.title: Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind
products.description: Capture the perfect finish to your windows with this fantastic faux suede roman blind. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. The faux suede barley roman blind is a lovely cream colour and is an excellent way to enhance your home at an affordable price.

products.title: Faux Suede Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: This classic grey roman blind has an attractive suede finish and will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Our luxury side control chain headrail system allows quick and easy installation. Combine with contrasting curtains or simply use it on its own for a perfect crisp finish to your windows. Very much on trend, the mercury grey blind will bring a touch of luxury to your home at a fraction of the cost compared to high street prices.

Pleasing to the eye, and great to touch the malta range adds a touch of class to your home interior.
